title: Intro
description: An introduction to the codebase and how to contribute.

steps.description: The first thing you'll want to do is install the dependencies. This project uses `yarn` so run `yarn` or `yarn install` from the root.
Afterwards, start up the project locally by running `yarn dev`. Watch the build output so you know when it's done building and running. Navigate to localhost:8000 in your browser.
The components live in the `src/components` folder.
Individual blog posts live under `content/blog` each with their own directory based on the date + the name of the blog post. Blog posts are written in Markdown.
When you open a pull request, you'll be prompted with this template. After you fill it out, open your pull request and I will review it :)
The CI process will run when you open a PR. It checks to make sure the dependencies can be installed and the project builds.
That's it! Welcome to the joeprevite.com codebase and thanks for contributing :)
